overview: Where guests check in...and never want to check out! When the johns have stopped cruising,  Hollywood's hottest hustlers hole themselves up this abandoned hotel to indulge in their deepest pleasures.  Searing action that's not for the faint-hearted. Cum's gonna fly!
tagline: When the johns have stopped cruising, Hollywood's hottest hustlers hole themselves up in this   abandoned hotel - to indulge in their deepest pleasures. Searing action that's not for the faint-hearted!
title: Hotel Hell
